item.title: üéâ Cheers to another year of mapping adventures! May your New Year be filled with exciting mapping challenges and successful contributions. Let's map a brighter future together! üåêüöÄ #OpenStreetMap #maps #gischat #map #geo #gis

Come visit the #OpenStreetMap stand at #37c3! /cc @gislars Photo of a large printer from an angle. Underneath is a OpenStreetMap banner.Side view of a printer showing a few stacks of square OpenStreetMap stickers, and flyers
Mappy Christmas! *(if it's your thing)* #OpenStreetMap #Christmas

Congratulations to @weeklyOSM for publishing their 700 issue! For years, the team of volunteers has published a weekly summary of what's happening in the OpenStreetMap world in many languages. Congrats! https://weeklyosm.eu/ #OpenStreetMap Logo, with weekly OSM on the left and a big 700 on the right!

The OSM Foundation has chosen its new round of officers. Guillaume Rischard (@grischard) is Chairperson, Roland Olbricht is Treasurer, and Craig Allan is Secretary üîó https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Board/Minutes/2023-12 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF

The OpenStreetMap Foundation and the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team have signed a trademark license agreement, allowing HOT to use the ‚ÄúOpenStreetMap‚Äù name. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #HOT #hotosm

HOT (Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team) is joining the OSMF as a silver corporate member. https://www.hotosm.org/updates/exciting-milestones-reached-between-hot-and-the-openstreetmap-foundation/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #HOT #hotosm
Congratulations to Daniela (Dani) Waltersdorfer Jimenez, Guillaume Rischard (@grischard) and Roland Olbricht on being elected to the OSM Foundation Board at the AGM. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF
Only 24 hours left to vote in the #OpenStreetMap Foundation AGM! Polls close at 15:00Z (1¬†hr before the AGM). https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board

Are you going to the Chaos Communications Congress in Hamburg this year (#37c3 Unlocked)? OpenStreetMappers will be there, why not help out? üôÇ More on the OSM wiki: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Chaos_Communication_Congress/37C3 Forum: https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/osm-auf-dem-37c3-in-hamburg/105092 @CCC #OpenStreetMap #OSM #ccc
The 2023 report from the OSMF's Personnel Committee is here https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023/Personnel_committee's_report #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation
The 2023 OpenStreetMap Foundation Chairperson's Report (from @grischard) is here: https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Stereo/diary/402961 #OSM #OSMF #OpenStreetMap #OSMFoundation

Are you an OSM Foundation member (or assoc. member)? Have you received your election ballot? (If you're entitled to vote). If not, please contact the OSMF MWG: membership@osmfoundation.org #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation

OSMF AGM news: Unfortunately, we've found a bug in recording all OSMF membership renewals, so people who are entitled to vote might not have received their ballot yet. At the OSMF AGM later today, the members will be asked to postpone the GM for a week, until 15:00 UTC Saturday, 16th December 2023, to allow people to vote. More on this as it develops. read more: https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2023-December/008807.html https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/osmf-board-election-irregularities-in-sending-out-election-ballots/106827 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF
Only 24 hours left to vote in the #OpenStreetMap Foundation AGM! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board

@FOSSGISeV > With our large OSM community and many OSM users in Germany FOSSGIS e.V. sees our responsibility to help the global OSM community where we can. --J√∂rg Thomsen, chairperson of the FOSSGIS board of directors Thanks for your support.

FOSSGIS e.V., the German OSMF Local Chapter ( @FOSSGISeV ) has committed to providing annual financial support to the OpenStreetMap Foundation! üéâ https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/12/08/fossgis-e-v-commits-to-an-annual-gift-to-openstreetmap/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #FOSSGIS

Don't forget to vote in the OSMF Board elections! You should have received your ballot via email. Some web extensions can break the ballot page and cause you to unwittingly ‚Äúvote for nothing‚Äù. Read more: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023/Voting_Information_and_Instructions

The OSMF AGM will take place at 16:00 UTC. Use this page <https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=OSMF+17th+Annual+General+Meeting+-+9th+December+2023&iso=20231209T16&p1=1440> to see what time that is for you. Here's a countdown to when it starts: <https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?p0=1440&iso=20231209T16&msg=OSMF%2017th%20Annual%20General%20Meeting%20-%209th%20December%2020232>

The OSMF AGM will take place, like every year, on IRC, on the `#osmf-gm` channel on the OFTC network. You can join with a IRC client, using the web page, or via a Matrix client https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Annual_General_Meetings/2023#Join
